amendment.description: Amendment establishes an Interagency Hostage Recovery Coordinator to direct hostage rescue efforts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 114-112 to establish an Interagency Hostage Recovery Coordinator to direct hostage rescue efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Hunter.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
